name: Tangled (flber)
description:
[For best results play on desktop with a mouse]

In Tangled, you play as a ball of yarn trying to escape the claws of a cat by climbing up a board covered in post-its and thumbtacks. 

Programming by Ezra and Ben, music by Separate Shelter, art by Ben

Sound effects by BerduSmith and oldhiccup on freesound.org

Controls

  • Left click and hold on post it to fire
  • Let go to release
  • Shake the mouse (fast) to boost in the direction you're going
  • Escape to pause
